CustomField.description: Field to determine which contacts sync to Marketo from Salesforce. 08/11/2023 - We do not sync Employee and Contractor contacts with Marketo. July/24 - This field is being repurposed for BSS-2391. Going forward this will indicate whether the contact needs to be synced to Marketo.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field used to indicate if a contact needs to be deleted from Marketo
CustomField.label: Delete from Marketo
